languages.text: Пока подданные изливают злобу на мутантов и подозрительных соседей, воду очищают. Многие погибли, но колония уверовала, что возвращение питьевых запасов — награда за нетерпимость к искажению облика человеческого.

While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.
languages.original_text: Пока подданные изливают злобу на мутантов и подозрительных соседей, воду очищают. Многие погибли, но колония уверовала, что возвращение питьевых запасов — награда за нетерпимость к искажению облика человеческого.

traits.locale_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on the mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance toward violations of the human form.
Your subjects succeed in identifying and eliminating the saboteurs, but the poison takes its toll, stealing the minds of an increasing number of inhabitants of the world.

While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.
Your subjects succeed in identifying and eliminating the saboteurs, but the poison takes its toll, stealing the minds of an increasing number of the world's inhabitants.

While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on the mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance toward violations of the human form.

While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

languages.text: Alors que les sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} passent leur colère sur des mutants et autres voisins jugés suspects, l'eau finit par être purifiée. Si l'on déplore de nombreuses victimes, les habitants de la colonie sont à présent convaincus que le retour de l'approvisionnement en eau est la récompense de leur intolérance envers le moindre signe de difformité quelle qu'elle soit.
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

traits.locale_text: Alors que les sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} passent leur colère sur des mutants et autres voisins jugés suspects, l'eau finit par être purifiée. Si l'on déplore de nombreuses victimes, les habitants de la colonie sont à présent convaincus que le retour de l'approvisionnement en eau est la récompense de leur intolérance envers le moindre signe de difformité quelle qu'elle soit.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の臣下たちが変異体や不審な隣人たちに怒りをぶつけている間も、水は浄化されていく。多くの人々が命を落としたが、今ではコロニーの人々は、水の供給が戻ったのは、人間の姿からの逸脱を容認しなかったことへの報いだと固く信じている。
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の臣下たちが変異体や不審な隣人たちに怒りをぶつけている間も、水は浄化されていく。多くの人々が命を落としたが、今ではコロニーの人々は、水の供給が戻ったのは、人間の姿からの逸脱を容認しなかったことへの報いだと固く信じている。

languages.text: 行商浪人的臣民将怒火发泄在形迹可疑或身体发生突变的邻居身上。在此期间，水源也恢复了正常。许多人在这场清洗中丧命，而活下来的人们坚信，正是由于他们对变种人不再心怀容忍，水源才得到了净化。
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的臣民将怒火发泄在形迹可疑或身体发生突变的邻居身上。在此期间，水源也恢复了正常。许多人在这场清洗中丧命，而活下来的人们坚信，正是由于他们对变种人不再心怀容忍，水源才得到了净化。

languages.text: Mientras los súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente desatan su ira contra los mutantes y contra vecinos sospechosos, se purifica el agua. Muchos han muerto, pero la gente de la colonia ahora cree que el regreso del suministro de agua se debe a su intolerancia contra la degeneración de la forma humana.
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

traits.locale_text: Mientras los súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente desatan su ira contra los mutantes y contra vecinos sospechosos, se purifica el agua. Muchos han muerto, pero la gente de la colonia ahora cree que el regreso del suministro de agua se debe a su intolerancia contra la degeneración de la forma humana.

languages.text: Während die Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ihre Wut an Mutanten und misstrauischen Nachbarn auslassen, wird das Wasser gesäubert. Viele sind gestorben, doch nun sind die Bewohner der Kolonie überzeugt, dass die Rückkehr der Wasservorräte ihre Belohnung dafür ist, Abweichungen in der menschlichen Gestalt nicht zu tolerieren.
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.

traits.locale_text: Während die Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ihre Wut an Mutanten und misstrauischen Nachbarn auslassen, wird das Wasser gesäubert. Viele sind gestorben, doch nun sind die Bewohner der Kolonie überzeugt, dass die Rückkehr der Wasservorräte ihre Belohnung dafür ist, Abweichungen in der menschlichen Gestalt nicht zu tolerieren.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in tebaası öfkesini mutantlardan ve şüpheli komşularından çıkarırken su arıtıldı. Birçok kişi hayatını kaybetse de artık koloni halkı, su kaynaklarının geri gelmesinin insan formundaki sapmalara gösterdikleri hoşgörüsüzlüğün bir ödülü olduğuna kesin olarak inanıyor.
languages.original_text: While the Rogue Trader's subjects take out their anger on mutants and suspicious neighbours, the water is purified. Many have perished, but now the people of the colony firmly believe that the return of the water supplies is their reward for intolerance of deviations in the human form.
